ComicInfo.Summary:
Shipping bi-weekly, the Summer of TMNT starts now! The Turtles are trapped by a fearsome new mutant foe with seemingly no way of escape. Their friends make a last-ditch attempt to save the Turtles, but will secrets in City Hall spell salvation or doom?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Nelson Daniel | 1 | B | Cover B | Kevin Eastman (a) & Fahriza Kamaputra (c) | 2 | RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Cover | Brett Brooks | 3 | RE | Retailer Exclusive Variant Cover | Freddie E. Williams II | 4 | RE | Retailer Exclusive Variant Cover (Black & White) | Freddie E. Williams II | 5 |
